price: 52. Maalinta aysan waxba u tareyn daalimiinta cudur daarashadoodu. Waxayna leeyihiin nacalad oo waxay leeyihiin Daarta xun (Naar).
arabic: يَوۡمَ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡۖ وَلَهُمُ ٱللَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ سُوٓءُ ٱلدَّارِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma lā yanfaʿu al-ẓālimīna maʿdhiratuhum walahumu al-laʿnatu walahum sūu al-dāri
